img_text: Standard Standard Chartered "I hope Man City get over the line Chartered Stand before Liverpool. I couldn't bear to see them win it, it would be a nightmare for any Evertonian. I remember in 2005 they won the Champions League and they're still talking about it now so it would be another 10 or 15 years of that." LEC Wayne Rooney on the Premier League title race via talkSPORT
